alert.note: Alert for Marion (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued August 13 at 5:33PM CDT until August 13 at 11:00PM CDT by NWS Wichita
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 630 PM CDT FOR NORTHWESTERN CHASE AND EAST CENTRAL MARION COUNTIES... At 533 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Burdick, or 13 miles southeast of Herington, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Cottonwood Falls, Strong City, Hymer, Tallgrass Prairie, and Tallgrass Prairie Preserve. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
